name: azure-relay-tunnel-ts
description: Azure Relay Hybrid Connection Tunneling Utility (TypeScript/Node.js)

scripts.package:win: npm run build:release && pkg dist/index.js --targets node20-win-x64 --output bin/win/RelayTunnelUsingHybridConnection.exe && node build.js && copy .env.template bin\win\.env.template
scripts.package:linux: npm run build:release && pkg dist/index.js --targets node20-linux-x64 --output bin/linux/RelayTunnelUsingHybridConnection-linux && copy .env.template bin\linux\.env.template
scripts.package:macos: npm run build:release && pkg dist/index.js --targets node20-macos-x64 --output bin/macos/RelayTunnelUsingHybridConnection-macos && copy .env.template bin\macos\.env.template
scripts.package:all: npm run package:win && npm run package:linux && npm run package:macos
